name: Elise Huard
quote: I'm very, very impressed with Travis and how easy it is to set up. There's no longer any excuse to have a broken build.

name: Evan Phoenix
quote: With friends like Travis CI, we can't lose!

name: José Valim
quote: Travis is like Github for CIs. So easy to setup that everyone does it.

name: Joseph Wilk
quote: Great to see the Ruby community again pushing the boundaries of what is the default for OSS. Travis now is.

name: Lindsey Bieda
quote: Travis is mesmerizing. Yellow, yellow, yellow, GREEN! Victory!

name: Nick Quaranto
quote: I must say, I was skeptical, but @travisci is awesome.

name: Aslak Hellesoy
quote: I have used many CI systems, but Travis is the most awesome one so far!!

name: Carol Nichols
quote: Watching Travis CI results is addicting. I love the peace of mind it gives me. Thank you @travisci for this valuable community resource!

name: Sean Cribbs
quote: If you haven't tried yet, do put your project on @travisci. Awesome app with many nice people behind it.

name: Roberto Decurnex
quote: After Github I think this is the second best free service I have ever seen!

name: Ryan Bates
quote: @travisci I love what you're doing, keep up the great work!

name: Renée De Voursney
quote: Just got my timecapsule gem onto @travisci. It's so easy to test against different Ruby and Rails versions! I love it!

name: Sarah Mei
quote: Travis CI runs Diaspora tests on 2 databases and 4 rubies - with no maintenance. It's incredibly simple and staggeringly useful.

name: Jeff Casimir
quote: I'm sure there was life before @travisci, but I choose to ignore it.

name: Durran Jordan
quote: Every time I see a nice build matrix pass on @travisci I get a warm tingly feeling in my loins.

name: Rebecca Miller-Webster
quote: Always reassured by @travisci green light on code I'm using. Even better on my own repo! Perfect CI for open source.

name: Assaf Arkin
quote: Travis CI is a no brainer. It’s free. It works. It’s trivial to setup.

name: Fabio Kuhn
quote: Big ♥ to @travisci for that awesome and free CI service.

name: Raphaela Wrede
quote: @travisci makes open source even more open, making the build status visable to the community in a sexy way. you guys are porn!

name: Brian Ford
quote: Travis-CI is simply killin it! What a terrific resource this will be for Ruby and other communities.

name: Ben Hoskings
quote: Oh man, @travisci is a friggin' marvel. So good.

name: Alex Sharp
quote: travisci is just, mad awesome.

name: Ernie Miller
quote: I can’t recommend TravisCI enough. If you aren’t using it, you should be.

name: Ryan Bates
quote: I must say, @travisci is amazing.

name: Georg Ledermann
quote: Running tests is fun with @travisci.

name: Jason Roelofs
quote: @travisci is just awesome. It really couldn't be easier to use.

name: Raoul Millais
quote: Loving @travisci - the nodejs support is superb.

name: Flipping Bits
quote: Travis rocks!

name: Nicolás Hock Isaza
quote: @travisci is one of the best things I've seen.

name: Danny Burkes
quote: The more stuff I put on @travisci, the more I like @travisci

name: Marc G Gauthier
quote: Setting up @TravisCI for my continuous integration was so incredibly simple I could cry.

name: Till Schulte-Coerne
quote: I just realized how awesome travis-ci really is. Wow, thanks a lot!

name: Trevor Bramble
quote: Anyone else find themselves just staring at the @travisci dashboard?

name: Paul Yoder
quote: Wow! I must say that setting up a CI build with @travisci was dead simple. In less than 3 minutes I read the docs & started the first build.

name: Silveira Neto
quote: What a amazing idea is @travisci. I'll give a try. Continuous integration for the masses.

name: Derek Collison
quote: I really like Travis CI, that and Mocha from TJ are my two favorite tools for the day.

name: Derek Kastner
quote: .@travisci is awesome

name: Philip Arndt
quote: Travis CI makes it easy to maintain support for as many Ruby versions and configurations as possible, as lazily as possible. What a delight!
